name: Yet another french flag
description:
"ça fait beaucoup la non ?"

In the middle of the flag: 
The Restaurants du Cœur (literally Restaurants of the Heart but meaning Restaurants of Love), commonly known as the Restos du Cœur, is a French charity, the main activity of which is to distribute food packages and hot meals to those in need.

On the right of the flag:
a tribute to those who died on 15 november 2015 following the terrorist attacks in paris (in particular at the bataclan)
